.025 Linear Feet in one half manuscript box.
Circa 1898 This collection consists of the scrapbook of Charles Staton, a reporter on the "Brooklyn Standard Union" (1800-1910). The scrapbook contains newpspaer clippings as well as listings of various events to be covered by named reporters. There are several references to the Spanish American War of 1898. 1
Biographical / Historical
Charles Staton was a reporter on the "Brooklyn Standard Union."
Content Description
This collection consists of the scrapbook of Charles Staton, a reporter on the "Brooklyn Standard Union" (1800-1910). The scrapbook contains newpspaer clippings as well as listings of various events to be covered by named reporters. There are several references to the Spanish American War of 1898.
